code: import{useRef}from"react";import close from"../images/close.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InfoTooltip=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,isSuccess,message}=_ref;const overlayRef=useRef();function handleCloseClickOverlay(e){if(e.target===overlayRef.current){onClose();}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`modal ${isOpen?"modal_open":""}`,ref:overlayRef,onClick:handleCloseClickOverlay,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"modal__close-icon",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"modal__close-icon-img",src:close,alt:"\xCCcone para fechar o pop-up"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:`modal__icon ${isSuccess?"modal__icon_success":"modal__icon_error"}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:`modal__message ${isSuccess?"modal__message_success":"modal__message_error"}`,children:message})]})});};export default InfoTooltip;
